name: You may kiss
description:
The only thing that stands between you and eternal life together is a kiss. 

Try to find a way to make it happen and finally seal your marriage! Altough your spirits are already joined you still have the last step to accomplish - make your lips touch! Head to the feet doesn't count. But beware - you weren't able to book a normal place to have a wedding so you got stuck with a haunted creepy house. Get past traps and have fun in 10 exciting puzzle levels that are going to challenge your brain as well as your agaility. These levels are filled with many advanced mechanics such as levers!

Beat our best time of 2:51!
